distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Covid 19 intent recognition twitter dataset dataset

keywords: subject > health and fitness > health > health conditions > diseases > covid19
subject > health and fitness > health > health conditions

subject > science and technology > internet > online communities > social networks
name: Covid 19 intent recognition twitter dataset
description:
Based on the current pandemic situation Novel Coron-19 took a toll on all over the world and in this global crisis if we could get some insights on the current situation from social media data and understand people's intent and emotions on coronavirus.



Basically the dataset is classified into 8 different intent which is been pulled from twitter tweets which contain #coronavirus #covid19 in it.

## Category---description:
-----------------------

1- disease_signs_or_symptoms---Reports of symptoms such as fever, cough, diarrhea, and shortness of breath or questions related to these symptoms
2- disease_transmission---Reports of disease transmission or questions related to disease transmission
3- prevention---Questions or suggestions related to the prevention of disease or mention of a new prevention strategy
4- treatment---Questions or suggestions regarding the treatments of the disease
5- deaths_reports---Reports of deaths due to the disease
6- affected_people---Reports of affected people due to the disease
7- other_useful_information---Other useful information that is related to the disease 
8- not_related_or_irrelevant---Unrelated to the situation or irrelevant

Acknowledgment:

I would like to thank crisis NLP [https://crisisnlp.qcri.org/] for providing an initial level of the dataset of MERS and SARs pandemic which helped me to create ths  dataset
